attributes.action: Give homeowners more rights against the anti-social behaviour of neighbours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give Homeowners more rights against the anti-social behaviour of their neighbours such as abusive behaviour, excessive pot smoking, shouting, banging on ceilings, floors etc.  Ensure that police take complaints seriously and act upon it within 7 days.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
